snippet.title: Farmer's Dynasty | Announcement Trailer (Gamescom 2019)
snippet.description:
#FarmersDynasty will be available on 7 November 2019 on Xbox One, PlayStation®4 and later on Nintendo Switch™. 

Have you dreamed for years of living in the country? You can with Farmer’s Dynasty: get back to nature and become a farmer. 

Start with simple farming tools and grow quickly from there through deep gameplay: build, repair and harvest. Improve your yield by acquiring new agricultural facilities like greenhouses and silos on your way to becoming one of the top farmers in the village.

-------------------------------
For news about our other games, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/bigbengames
Twitter ►https://twitter.com/Bigben_Games

#Gamescom2019
